findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity and overhead, increasing gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables are not defined as immutable, which can lead to unnecessary computation and storage usage.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword to decrease gas consumption.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming conventions, which can lead to readability and maintainability issues.

findings.title: L11 - Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: Unnecessary boolean equalities are used in the contract, which can affect performance.

findings.title: L12 - Using Variables before Declaration
findings.description: Variables are used before declaration, which can lead to unexpected behavior and errors.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Uninitialized local variables are used, which can lead to unpredictable behavior and errors.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables are not properly validated, which can lead to problems when executed with zero values.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The contract does not check if the result of transfer methods is successful, which can lead to unexpected behavior.
